ing.item: Boneless skinless chicken breast halves; about 1 pound

directions.step:
Blend mustard, apricot preserves and ginger. Brush some mustard mixture on chicken. Grill or broil chicken, brushing with remaining mustard mixture frequently until done.
Recipe by: Gey Poupon ad.
Posted to MC-Recipe Digest V1 #1050 by Roberta Banghart <bobbi744@sojourn.com> on Jan 25, 1998
